text: DC Ink is an imprint of American comic book publisher DC Comics consisting of original one-shots and reprints of books previously published under other imprints. The imprint intends to present traditional DC Universe characters for young adult readers. The first title of the imprint, Mera: Tidebreaker, was published on February 2, 2019. The first reprint under the DC Ink Imprint was Supergirl: Being Super and was released on July 7, 2020. ==Comic books== {| class="wikitable collapsible sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" width="100%" |+DC Ink releases |- style="height: 3em;" !
